name: skillsswap
description: Project Name: SkillSwap – Decentralized Peer Learning Platform Concept: A platform where users can exchange skills without money – using a skill credit system. For example, someone can teach “JavaScript for 1 hour” and earn 1 skill credit, which they can use to learn “Guitar” or “Public Speaking” from someone else.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
